=====================

Front-end Web Developer in London UK (multiple positions)

CONDÉ NAST DIGITAL UK - PRODUCT DEVELOPMENT

> Wired.co.uk, Vogue.co.uk, GQ.co.uk

Apply (including a message) to peter.miller@condenast.co.uk

----------

Condé Nast, publisher of the world's highest quality reading experiences both in print and digital formats, seeks an established digital developer, at the mid-to-senior level, with extremely strong HTML and CSS skills to join the Digital Product team in London.

You will be working across the Condé Nast brands to build the next-generation of digital reading experiences, at scale. Some recent examples include:

- Long-form articles on Wired http://www.wired.co.uk/magazine/archive/2013/03/features/up

- News-reading experience on Glamour http://www.glamourmagazine.co.uk/news/celebrity/2014/01/15/f...

- Fashoin shows on Vogue http://www.vogue.co.uk/fashion/spring-summer-2014/ready-to-w...

- Wired UK iPhone app content https://itunes.apple.com/gb/app/wired-magazine-uk/id40070166...

What we're working on next is even more exciting and cutting-edge, and you will be working on building immersive front-end experiences, using HTML, for websites and apps. You will be collaborating with a passionate and highly-regarded team of designers, information architects , writers and developers in a creative and digitally-focused environment.

----------

Required Skills:

- Hand-crafting semantic HTML using the latest HTML5 techniques

- Writing CSS, and familiar with SCSS

- Building device-scalable layouts with percentage-based sizing and media queries

- Writing reusable Javascript libraries to support UX, and knowing when is best to use them

- Using Javascript to retrieve data and bind it to your HTML

- Templating your output, using a CMS Source control

----------

Exceptional candidates will have experience with:

- .Net and Visual Studio

- Back-end CMS development

- Optimising CSS and javascript for rendering performance

- Mercurial or Git

- Contributing to open source projects

=====================
